attributes.action: instruct the administrators of the petition site to explain how signatures can disappear from an approved petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last month (Sept 2008) I created a petition called AnnualCheckups.  When I looked at it, a few days after it had been approved, I saw it had garnered 5 signatures; next time I checked, however, it had LOST 2 of them!  I was under the impression that once someone had signed a petition his/her signature stood; so why did my petition, and possibly others, lose signatures? and how can they be restored?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
